text: Known since we were both so naive kids, and boy it's been a journey. Always liked how frank and straightforward you were, not caring for disagreement. And man that kutte ko kaatne wala kissa üòÇ Ccd and cbg me had amazing times! Let's see where life send us now! See you soon man!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Roses are red
Violets are blue
Ayush is a cunt
and so are you
üíñ
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Right from my first year, i couldn't place you anywhere in my understanding of a person. Thankfully that puzzled of in the end but man, was it exciting around you. Not the normie fun but something with more substance. Something my brain fucking loved. The wild viewpoints and observation, to ask the fun stuff. Gotta miss that man. Meet you in us now. Till then! Bubbye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
I always remember that gorgeous new year's night, that's probably my best in life yet. Such ease and fun it was! And those frequent walks around the campus, I'll always cherish that! Ooh and the taxing intern day went so smoother for us as we had each other! Beautiful times those!

Well times change and now it's different. But it's alright I think. We'll find a balance. I'm sorry I've been an unreliable friend, I'll do better, promise. Can't believe how much we've grown up and matured with the time, now creating our own unique careers. Let's make the path converge every few years. Until then, take care and be the caring person you've always been!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
I still remember you were the talk of legends back in our 1st year! The eternally sleeping yet 9.8 pointer mahician! Met you here and there, debating, antaragni and all, and had no idea the dissonance you were going through.

I'm glad you found something closer to what you wanted with life, even though you were already good at something lucrative! Milte hai kabhi, hopefully before alum meet, nahi to phir tu bude uncle ki tarah gyan dega. Till then, bye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Lol can't imagine i forgot about your memoir. You're making me socially lazy dude!

Kya hi likhu, sab to already bol diya hai. Yes college life was elevated tere roasts se. Yes tu bada wala ___ hai. Yes we times miss karunga, and yes, US me milte hai. Till then! Bubbye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
From organ attacks, bhand nights, to amazing mocha wine and beautiful lucknow places, had great times around you. Always ready to chapad chapad, you talked enough for 2 XD. And thanks for introducing me to a whole new genre of cheating movies lmao.

It's a new life from here, our separate ways. Live big and life fun. See ya!

P. S didn't read that Stormlight book did you? ü§î
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Zozoo! Starting from sg selection to all the amazing times, tera clarity and straightforwardness is sorta scary dude! End me didn't get time but i hope we'll meet someday soon! Gonna miss college a lot with all you guys. Till we meet again! Bye
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Gonna miss you so much man! Is baar college me didn't get much time, so wanted to see your bigda hua side lmao!

Those amazing cs days! Working and treating and partying like anything! I'll always remember that! And tera pure heart man ‚ù§Ô∏è

I wish thode misunderstandings aur errors kam hue hote, but it is what it is, and all is well in the end! Hope we meet again soon, bar chalenge! Till then, adieu!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
If there's someone I regret not having spent enough time most it's definitely you! In the comparatively less time we met around mess tables and classes it was lots of fun, and yeah really interesting viewpoints! And the stalkers lot what a grand joke it was, but it was a fantastic night!

Last me tu ata to aur maze karte but i guess this was it. And haan haan pune aunga, city bhi dekhunga and terse milunga bhi! Call kariyo kabhi maghne se phursat mile to! Till then , buy man!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
First of all, you made a bro proud with that bio üî•

CS was a great time, all that brainstorming, where we couldn't agree on anything, the wine day(yes I remember every one of ours back story and I'm humbledby it), the outings, and ooh, the picnic üòÖ, and how would it ever been that without all our(and Sagnik's mostly) inappropriate jokes!

Although I wish I could reverse the mistakes and misunderstandings, it is what it is and ig it was a worthy experience on it's own. You know on that cbg day after avisha posted that story I suddenly realised fuck.and she checked the views and you were there. Never have I been more scared of you xd. And they say the rest is history

Hey you still owe me that walk someday, it's on you to arrange that okay? Till then, have a great time dost. bubbye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Ever the festi buddy, apun ke circles juuust barely intersected back in college! Matlab pakka aggregate tere se spent time me 50 percent to tu bhand rahi hi hogi XD. Still remember wo Antaragni jab tu wo high seats pe baithi thi with like 6 people to look out for you and you're laughing like there's no tomorrow! Miss katenge college.

Let's see kab apne paths again intersect! Until then, bubbye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
First saw you whenI was with Akshay, cycling through acad area, going to L16 from that thin road by the wall. Baapre you talked a lot.

For all the ups and downs in the 4 years, and that is to say a LOT, it's been great to have you around! Movies, walks, outings, and ofc that candid day at RM, you're always filled with amazing stories!

It's been amazing to see you hold strong when many would buckle under the pressure, strong and bold. We are going our different ways, but I know we'll always be in touch and meet soon enough, hopefully in campus even! See ya!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Roses are red
Violets are blue
Akshay is a cunt
and so are you
üíñ
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Yeah man! Shuru me apun kaafi naive the! Kya pata, save wing hota to maybe mast time pass kiya hota! Wo weightlifting me we both were clueless AF but the process was fun isn't it! Rishi raj the na waha? Wish you the best in life man. Till we meet again!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Hey man! I'm so gonna miss the intermediate convos and times with you. It was so refreshing, outside my main group, your relaxed attitude, always filled with interesting thoughts and connections. And the booze is always better served with some intelligence. And boy i loved it.

These days will never come, but I'm glad we had it. Let's meet soon enough, at a new place, with new ambitions. Until then, buddye! ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Us din doaa canteen me maine terko lowkey stupid bol diya tha lmao. I totally take that back. Tera carefree attitude is gold, and I wish I had more of that. Do amazing aage life me, see ya soon! Byes!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: We should have met earlir right! I remember you from 3 years back in CS201 as the person who asked precise doubts, and that I admired. Quarantine would have been a whole other level of hell without you to chill out with. Those days felt like the beginning of college all over, with the terrace time, and the ball playing. So proud I was able to make you read Mistborn ; )  and glad you loved it! Let's stay in touch and meet soon man!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Orientation me we had a debate on should coaching companies pay toppers or not, oof I so ran out of points then. Then there was that nice Antaragni day, sitting in the tent and talking deep shit. Those really were the days nai! Always counted on your ease and upbeat nature. And you often seemed to have a controversial ties of stuff. It's so refreshing! I'm so proud I made you read stormlight XD. You seem like a cross btw nature of lopen and thinking of jasnah. And thanks for always being someone I can rely on and be sure will understand instead of judging. Hopefully we'll meet next year in US. Have a fantastic time at Stanford! üíñ
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Namaste bhaiya ji! Kya meme lord ka aura hai aapka! Had sone great times at cs man, especially the totally dank and inappropriate moments. Ooh and those south park YouTube videos. Mannn. And phir walks with team and all. Fantastic being around you. The lively energy, in which I see myself reflected! Stay in touch bro, aur chaapte raho. See you soon ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Itne log hai campus me, koi common daily activity hota to I'm sure we'd be great friends man! Had some random cycle pe discussions around kd na! Aur man hall 2 me kabhi kabhi kya epic nights hui hai, although mai shayad 3-4 me hi raha hu. Mast chaapte raho man! See you soon enough! Bye!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Hey buddy! Wo saare walks in H5 ke quads were memorable. Waha corridor ke end me baithke chitchat karna, that I'll miss/ And all the fun stuff we did in CS. You were always ready with a quick dirty joke XD. From office, to audi and h13, it was amazing times. Milte hai phir kabhi, till then, Alvida! üíñ
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Sirjeee! Kya miss karunga tumhe yaar, wo offhand comments and maat tera guilt trip karwana! Trust me, mai hi real hemant hu üòÅ

I've told you pehle bhi, you so remind me of my chota bhai. College life was a bit more fun coz you were around. Milte hai soon! Bakchod rehna aur aas paas ke logo ki one liners se lete rehna. Bye! ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Terko dost banaya coz it's so easy to talk to you. Tu khud hi talks enough for both of us XD. Apun stock the stock kiye the 2nd year that was a neat day, and finally tera bhand and sad stereotype break hua mere mind me. Tabse toh, it's been amazing having heated convos and debates about stuff. Love how you have such an interesting perspective on things and such clarity in thoughts! That ESC ka grade cutoffwala incident is going to be the best practical joke of my college XD. Now that I think of it, corridor me khuub time pass kiya hai apun ne, even though wings alag thi and we were rarely together for club work. Mitle hai tere se hopefully jan me. Until then, see you bro!
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text:
Bhula nahi ache se karne ka wait kar raha tha bc!

1st year ke baad I've missed having a roomie man. Matlab freedom had it's perks, but roomie hone ke bhi alag maze the. Random thoughts share karna. Tere gaane churana, aur tu mere gane churata XD. And yaad hai wo wall painting! Padaya bhi hai tumne thoda bahut. Tujhe padte dekhke hi to meri coi theek thaak rahi 1st sem bdk!
Hate that uske baad zyada frequently mil nahi paye, but hey 2 haath se taali bajti hai! Anyways, mast reh man, and stay in touch. Tera casual yet sincere attitude miss karta hu. And love it ki you never take me seriously. See you ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Kya journey thi last 5-6 years tere saath. We had our ups and downs, but kya maze kiye! From taekwondo, Antaragni, to hangouts with our group, and mess me time pass, college life was a bit more lit coz of you. And to top it all, you inspire people to be better, something I've been needing recently. Milte hai soon enough! Till then, Alvida üíñ
author: Hemant  Kejriwal

text: Bc kitna gayab rahega! Kya mast maze kiye the man, wo patte, aur wo dusre waale patte! Not to mention the daaru and mess ke fantastic chats. Teri bakchodi to yaad rakhunga man, bas tu jo gayab hua na itna, that will never be forgiven. Jab milenge tab uska saza diya jayega, and not at all by me alone. Until then, udte rahi dost! See ya
author: Hemant  Kejriwal
